Moreover, this plan has a Max Out-of-Pocket (MOOP) limit of $6500, meaning once the user meets this amount for covered services, HCI will cover 100% of remaining eligible charges for the rest of the year.

Taking into account the user's medical history and current data, the EPO plan from HCI offers a balance between coverage and affordability. The exclusion of cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments ensures that costs are kept under control while focusing on necessary medical care. Overall, this plan meets the user's needs by providing extensive coverage for their various chronic conditions, is relatively affordable given their income bracket, and offers protection from high healthcare expenses through its MOOP limit.
